mapper.select: select aaa.custId as custId, (select center_nm from cwt_mst_center where id =aaa.custId) as centerNm , aaa.countUnOut as countUnFinishedOut, aaa.outOrdDt as outOrdDt from (select om.cust_id as custId, count(oi.id) as countUnOut, om.out_ord_dt as outOrdDt from cwt_out_info as oi join cwt_out_ord_mst as om on oi.mst_id = om.id where om.use_yn ='Y' and oi.use_yn ='Y' and om.out_type !='OTAD' and now() > om.out_ord_dt and om.out_stats !='OS05' and om.out_stats !='OS99' group by om.cust_id, outOrdDt order by outOrdDt asc) as aaa;
mapper.insert: /*TestInsertMapper.insertInOrdNotificationInfo*/ insert cwt_notification_info ( cust_id, type_cd, content, create_dt, reg_date, mod_date ) values ( #{notificationInfoVO.custId}, #{notificationInfoVO.typeCd}, #{notificationInfoVO.content}, now(), now(), now() )
mapper.select: select ni.id from cwt_notification_info as ni left join (select id, info_id from cwt_ad_notification where ad_mid = #{adNotificationVO.adMid}) as an on ni.id = an.info_id where an.info_id is null;
mapper.insert: insert into cwt_ad_notification (info_id, ad_mid, read_yn) values (#{adNotificationVO.infoId}, #{adNotificationVO.adMid}, 'N');
mapper.select: select (select count(an.read_yn) from cwt_ad_notification as an join cwt_notification_info as ni on an.info_id = ni.id where type_cd='IN01' and ad_mid =#{adNotificationVO.adMid} and read_yn='N') as countInOrd , (select count(an.read_yn) from cwt_ad_notification as an join cwt_notification_info as ni on an.info_id = ni.id where type_cd='OS01' and ad_mid =#{adNotificationVO.adMid} and read_yn='N') as countOutOrd , (select count(an.read_yn) from cwt_ad_notification as an join cwt_notification_info as ni on an.info_id = ni.id where type_cd='UFOT' and ad_mid =#{adNotificationVO.adMid} and read_yn='N') as countUnFinishOut , (select count(an.read_yn) from cwt_ad_notification as an join cwt_notification_info as ni on an.info_id = ni.id where type_cd='JOIN' and ad_mid =#{adNotificationVO.adMid} and read_yn='N') as countJoin
